title: Does anyone actually use the headrests in their car? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are not ‘headrests’. They’re not provided for your comfort in normal driving. What they are for is to prevent your head snapping back in a crash and causing severe spinal injury. The idea is that your head is prevented from moving back too far under sudden acceleration. So don’t think ‘I never use these things’ and take them off.
